description: Defines a Note class with properties such as id, title, content, tags, and modified timestamp, including methods for serialization and deserialization to/from a Map, used for database operations.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Represents a note with id, title, content, tags, and a modified timestamp, including methods for converting to/from a map for database storage.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Serializes the Note instance into a Map suitable for database storage.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Creates a Note instance from a Map, optionally associating tags from a provided list of all tags.

calls: allTags.firstWhere((t) => t.name == tag, orElse: () => Tag(name: tag))
